disclaimer: This app is not built by Counties Power, nor does it have any affiliation with the existing app they have built.
notif-sub-form-location-placeholder: Enter the location / area where you would like to be notified for (e.g. Smith Street)
notif-sub-form-one-field-change: Please ensure at least one field has been changed before submitting
cron-no-outages: No outages exist! Please run the update script, or check any actually exist on the Counties Power website
notif-email-new: There has been a status change for an upcoming planned power outage which may be in the location you subscribed to notifications for.
notif-email-changed: There is an upcoming planned power outage which may be in the location you subscribed to notifications for.
sub-confirm-email-unsub: If this subscription was made in error, or you no longer wish to receive notifications, you can unsubscribe $unsubLink
